"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>05aa331f-cfd1-4fb1-bfab-b6107c07a3ca#1#1</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Tükörképével azonos tárgyak</string>
            <string language="en">objects similar to their images reflected by mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wendet ähnliches gegen ihre Bilder ein, die durch
Spiegel reflektiert werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objecte semblable à leurs images reflétées par 
le miroir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">objeta similar a suas imagens refletidas pelo 
espelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obietta simile alle loro immagini riflesse dallo 
specchio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντικείμενα παρόμοια με τις εικόνες τους που 
απεικονίζονται από τον καθρέφτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">se opone similar a sus imágenes reflejadas por 
el espejo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Tükörképével azonos tárgyak</string>
            <string language="en">objects similar to their images reflected by mirror</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">tükörkép, térgy, azonos, tükörképével azonos</string>
            <string language="en">image, object, same, similar to their image</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wendet ähnliches gegen ihre Bilder ein, die durch
Spiegel reflektiert werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">objecte semblable à leurs images reflétées par 
le miroir</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">objeta similar a suas imagens refletidas pelo 
espelho</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">obietta simile alle loro immagini riflesse dallo 
specchio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντικείμενα παρόμοια με τις εικόνες τους που 
απεικονίζονται από τον καθρέφτη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">se opone similar a sus imágenes reflejadas por 
el espejo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bild, Nachricht, selbe, ähnlich ihrem Bild</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image, objet, même, semblable à leur image</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem, objeto, mesmo, similar a sua imagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine, oggetto, stesso, simile alla loro immagine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εικόνα, αντικείμενο, ίδιος, παρόμοιο με την εικόνα τους</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imagen, objeto, igual, similar a su imagen</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>

        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
